original_text: He said, “The four large animals are four kings. They will rule kingdoms on the earth. He said, “The four large animals are four kings. They will rule kingdoms on the earth.
korean_text: 그 네 큰 짐승은 세상에 일어날 네 왕이라

sentences.original_text: The four large animals are four kings
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마리 큰 짐승은 네 명의 왕이다

sentences.original_text: They will rule kingdoms on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅에 있는 왕국들을 다스릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: The four large animals are four kings
